meta.about:
We specialise in venue decoration of all types and offer a range of balloons including foil, latex, message balloons, popping balloons, balloon gifts etc.

For further information please come and visit our Balloon Shop or website - www.sweetieballoon.com
meta.addr: Shop 207-208, SOLO Building, 41-43 Carnarvon Road, Tsim Sha Tsui,KLN, HK
